RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Supreme Court of the United States: the Supreme Court of the United States

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.immigration checkpoints: Locations where routine vehicle stops are conducted to ascertain occupants' citizenship
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the Supreme Court of the United States: Highest court in the United States that has recognized the constitutionality of suspicionless vehicle stops at immigration checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent: Agent responsible for conducting stops and determining citizenship status of individuals
